descriptions.curl: Opens a given url within a new tab on your default browser.
descriptions.cat: The cat utility reads files sequentially, writing them to the standard output.
descriptions.ls: For each operand that names a file of a type other than directory, ls displays its name as well as any requested, associated information.

sequence: Starting Remount Root and Kernel File Systems...
Type HELP to see available commands and MAN < command > to see what each one of them does.
Or just simply scroll down for UI.
